parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description:
The priority of an MX-type DNS record. Valid values: `[1,50]`.

This parameter must be specified if the type of the DNS record is MX.

parameters.name: RR
parameters.description:
The host record.

For example, to resolve @.example.com, you must set RR to an at sign (@) instead of leaving it blank.

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description: The ID of the DNS record.

parameters.name: TTL
parameters.description: The TTL of the resolution. Default value: 600. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the DNS record.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The value of the DNS record.
